name: Factory: The Industrial Devolution
overview: Factory: The Industrial Devolution is a standout puzzle game for Macintosh. Control the toggles on an assembly line, to manufacture the required amount of whatever product you hapopen to be making. Mistakes will peanalise you, although can sometimes be disposed of. Think ahead and be mindful of everything going on, as gameplay can get very hectic. Factory comes with an official level set, and numerous community made sets as well, thanks to it's editor.
